main event: An unidentified object was observed in North Rome Township, Bradford County, Pennsylvania, on 10/3/53 between 8:00 and 8:15 p.m.
interesting points: The object was initially sighted in a stationary position but appeared to hover and move slightly upward and downward similar to a helicopter., It was reported to emit no sound and showed no visible exhaust steam., A witness reported seeing the same object at approximately the same location a year prior., The sighting occurred at night under clear conditions., The report concludes that the sighted object was determined to be Arcturus, an astronomical body.
witness description: One witness was Special Agent Harold K. Allen, Jr., and two other unidentified local residents.
